questions.questionText: How many IOTA tokens were migrated from the Stardust network during the IOTA Rebased launch?
What is one of the key purposes of IOTA tokens in governance?

answerOptions.answerText: They are used to mint new tokens.
They grant the right to participate in on-chain voting.
They allow users to store more data.
They reduce gas fees for transactions.

questions.questionText: How did the number of decimals for the IOTA token change after the Rebased release?
